title: Alzheimer's Disease: Can We Lower the Risk?
itunes:title: Alzheimer's Disease: Can We Lower the Risk?
description:
This meta-analysis is a useful reminder of risk factors to look for in your patients. You can also help them understand the long-term risks of Alzheimer's disease.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 23
  • Evidence-Based Prevention of Alzheimer's Disease: Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis of 243 Observational Prospective Studies and 153 Randomised Controlled Trials
